doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Chandana Prasanna Suwadarathna Vs. The Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Chandana Prasanna Suwadarathna Vs. The Hon. Attorney General
latest_doc_d.keywords: Procurement of a person to become a prostitute – Absence of procurement where there is independent initiative, motivation and prior arrangements to engage in prostitution
latest_doc_d.legistation: Section 360A(1) of the Penal Code as amended by the Penal Code (Amendment) Act No. 22 of 1995 and 16 of 2006.
